name: Showcase (Schwer)
description:
Demonstrating the item and inventory system from schwer-scripts, as well as a yet to be uploaded WebGL-compatible save/load system.
Project readme: here!

Controls:

  • Move: WASD / arrows
  • Save: 1
  • Load: 2
  • Load new: 3
  • Open inventory: tab

(I'm not sure why the text is 'fuzzy')
